messages.title: Labour's record of shame...
messages.content: an illegal war in Iraq and the deaths of over 100,000 people, the collapse of the banks, higher income tax for people on low incomes, sleaze and crisis in Parliament, introducing top up fees after promising not to do so

messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. Nick Clegg’s tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn—cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. Implementing Nick Clegg’s tax plan, so no tax is paid on the first £10,000 earned, cutting most tax bills by £700

mentions.tacticalSituation: Just 405 votes separate Labour and the Lib Dems in Edinburgh South. Voting Conservative, SNP or Green will just help Labour.

issues.education: introducing top up fees after promising not to do so

images.caption: Leaflet page with information about Fred Mackintosh, the Liberal Democrats, and their policies for Edinburgh South.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Your Labour MP has quit. Isn't it time you had a local MP who fights for you?
